description: This module will allow students to explore the sources, arguments and scholarship related to a major theme in Singaporean History. While the material and specific focus of the module will shift, as each instructor will offer a unique approach and topic, it will introduce students to many of the basic issues in the discipline of history as it is practiced in Singapore, and require research in both the field and library on a specific issue, thus enhancing their research and writing skills.
title: Topics in Singaporean History
